Name: Scotch Point
Ingredients: 15 ml Punt E Mes vermouth amaro
1 dash Peychaud's or other Creole-style bitters
Instructions: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice filled glass.
Review: Scotch, vermouth, fortified wine, and bitters. If there is a Manhattan, then this is Aberdeen, Glasgow, and Edinburgh rolled into one.
History: Adapted from a recipe created in 2011 by Ian Cameron, London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Scotch Point contains 178 calories
